IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.release_beginner_protection') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.release_beginner_protection GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.release_beginner_protection @character_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Characters SET beginner_protection = 0 WHERE id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
